name: sdh-global-ai-assistant
description: SDH Global AI Assistant - Multi-frontend architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:admin
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../admin-panel && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules admin-panel/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist admin-panel/.next admin-panel/build

author: SDH Global
